# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s; text_width=10)
    words = split(s, " ")
    line = ""
    result = ""

    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            result *= line * "\n"
            line = word
        else
            if line != ""
                line *= " "
            end
            line *= word
        end
    end
    result *= line

    result
end

# Example usage:
println(wrap_string("This is a long sentence that should wrap"))
```
